title: [Bug] When user send order without lineup, just click take a number, back to send order successfully
body:
Steps to reproduce:
i. User view menu, http://food.lynked.co.jp/food/%E6%A8%A9%E4%B9%9D/
ii. User add food into cart
iii. User try to place order
iv. User will be prompt to do lineup
v. User direct press take a number without filling anything.
vi. User try to place order again.
vii. Observe

Expected result:
User should not allowed to send order successfully

Actual result:
User is able to send order successfully without lineup
